blacklistuser.description: blocks a user from using the bot
blacklistuser.notFound: Found no entry for this id.
blacklistuser.saved: %user has been blacklisted from using the bot.
blacklistuser.removed: The blacklist entry for `%user` has been removed.
blacklistuser.owner: I can't blacklist the owner of the bot!

eval.description: inject JavaScript code directly into the bot

globalsync.description: syncs the bot's slash commands with all guilds

The following `%input` command(s) have been reloaded:
`%input`

setactivity.invalidType:
This is not a valid type. Valid types are:
